message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $12,000. I believe it offers significant value, but I'm open to discussing the price further.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, $12,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for the product. I believe it's a fair price considering the value it offers, and I'm willing to make a serious commitment to purchase it if we can agree on this price.
Thanks for the offer, Bob.  I understand your perspective on the value.  To be fair to both of us, I could meet you halfway at $10,500. This is my final offer.

Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, $10,500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $9,500 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it offers, and I'm willing to make a serious commitment to purchase it if we can agree on this price.
